briefdescription.para: An Implementation of a Rendezvous using Semaphores.

detaileddescription.para: Author: Peter Lucan Student Number: C00228946 Date: 03/11/2020 Name : Lab 3 - Rendezvous Decription: Uses a Semaphore which ensures that one thread finished it's actions beore another thread can begin.
Uses C++11 features such as mutex and condition variables to implement an example of a rendezvous for threads
